Tarek Shahin (amụrụ n'afọ 1982) bụ onye Egypt na-ese ihe osise na onye edemede

A maara ya nke ọma dị ka onye edemede na onye na-ese ihe osise nke ihe na-atọ ọchị 'Al Khan', nke pụtara na mbụ na peeji nke akwụkwọ akụkọ The Daily News Egypt na 2008, ma na-aga n'ihu na-agba ọsọ n'onwe ya na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ usoro ahụ.
A matala ọrụ Shahin maka nkọwa ya n'ụzọ ziri ezi banyere ọha mmadụ Ijipt nke oge a na isiokwu ndị na-akpali àgwà.
N'afọ 2017, 'Redemption: An Al Series Khan,' akụkọ nwere akụkụ atọ, malitere, nke e mere mgbe Agha Ụbọchị Isii gasịrị na 1967. E mechara bipụta ya dị ka akwụkwọ: 'Redemption: An Egyptian Story.'
Shahin bụkwa onye na-arụ n'ụlọ nchekwa ego, dị ka ngalaba ndụ nke "As You Were," akwụkwọ ya nke anọ 'Al Khan'.
